ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone give some info on how exactly it is supposed to work?  I believe you can pick a magic skill and specialize in it, but to what extent will it
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone give some info on how exactly it is supposed to work? I believe
you can pick a magic skill and specialize in it, but to what extent will it
improve?
Aznyin
Level 15 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]

-----Original Message-----
From: John "Spyke" Alexander [mailto:spyke@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 4:18 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Wizard Spell Components


Specialization has been pulled for re-coding, I beleive. As it was broke
in the first place, it isn't a loss. Once they re-implement it, it should
be working fine.

-Me
----- Original Message -----
From: Frank Varbel
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 10:40 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Wizard Spell Components


Greetings fellow students of the Art.

I a 21st level wizard who wants to delve into research headlong. Is
it true that for Wizard spells only Runes are needed? Or do the scraps of
parchment offer any benefit?

Also, on a side note, what happened to specialization? Cant seem
to train in it at the Guild halls anymore.

Thanks,
Arkaine Stormlord
Innoruuk Server
